LightingElectricalConspicuity.recommendedAction: Replace bulbs/fuses; ensure all lights function.
Repair stop lamp wiring or bulb.

LightingElectricalConspicuity.description: All lamps required to be mounted securely
LightingElectricalConspicuity.recommendedAction: Tighten or replace loose lamp assemblies.
Repair or replace trailer light system.
Repair wiring with proper insulation connectors.
Install a proper battery box or cover.
